column5: I have lost my reg book and my girlfreind is bugging  me about fishing in brantford.

Hey Jeremy, you're good to go, as long as you have updated your card with a new sticker for this year. Pike is open until the end of March. It will then close until mid May for the spawn. Good luck in the Grand with all it's chocolate milk running high due to melt off. Try some slack eddies or slower moving stretches with live bait or huskyjerks/x-raps twitched slow and methodically.
